pkgmetadata.longdescription: Audiogram Scattergrams // Creates pre- and post- intervention scattergrams based on audiometric data. These scattergrams are formatted for publication in Otology Neurotology and other otolaryngology journals. For more details, see Gurgel et al (2012) doi:10.1177/0194599812458401, Oghalai and Jackler (2016) doi:10.1177/0194599816638314.
